attributes.action: Leave voters have a voice too, petition to stop the silencing of our leave vote.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to demonstrate that not all leave voters have changed their mind since the results, to demonstrate that not only remain campaigners can share their thoughts. 

The Leave campaign won, the press and remain campaigners need to stop silencing the voice of millions of leave supporters. 

If you voted leave, you still vote leave and you want your voice to reach the levels that the remain voters are reaching. Sign this petition, show that we also have a valid opinion.
attributes.background: Since the announcement of the vote leave referendum, social media and press have continued to push a second referendum. In many cases silencing the voting voice of those millions who voted leave. The Remain campaign is screaming and shouting above the leave voters and this is simply not fair.
